Accessibility features

ARIA

Use of ARIA attributes to provide an accessible interaction.

Color Contrast

The contrast ratio between text and background passes WCAG 2 level AA.

Keyboard Navigation

You can navigate through the site only using the keyboard.

Screen Reader

Reading and navigation tested with VoiceOver screen reader.

Semantic Structure

Pages structured using semantic HTML.

Valid Code

W3C valid code to ensure the site works properly on all browsers.

A new look

Since this theme is based on Bootstrap, it includes all Bootstrap itself does but with new aesthetics.

See styles

Easy to customize

Install the theme easily with just a few commands.

Questions

What version of Bootstrap are the theme built on?

The theme are built on versions of Bootstrap v4. As more Bootstrap updates are launched the theme will be updated as needed.

What methods of payments are supported?

You can purchase the theme on Bootstrap Themes via any major credit/debit card (via Stripe) or with your Paypal account.

How do I get help with the theme?

Support for the theme is given for 6 months after you purchase the theme and is specific to questions around functionality, bugs, and basic implementation.

Is this a WordPress theme?

No, this is a HTML theme made with Bootstrap. It doesnâ€™t include any back-end functionality.
